mapper.select: SELECT bonus_budget_id, budget_year, amount_bonus_budget, bonus_before_one, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM bonus_budget WHERE bonus_budget_id=#{bonusBudgetId} and delete_flag=0
SELECT case when max(budget_year) is null then IFNULL(max(budget_year),YEAR(NOW())+1) else max(budget_year)+1 end as budget_year FROM bonus_budget WHERE delete_flag = 0

SELECT bonus_budget_id, budget_year, amount_bonus_budget, bonus_before_one, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM bonus_budget WHERE budget_year=#{budgetYear} and delete_flag=0

SELECT DISTINCT bb.amount_bonus_budget , bbp.indicator_id , bbp.bonus_weight, ifnull(ts.target_value,0) as target_value, ifnull(toc.actual_total,0) as actual_total from bonus_budget bb left join bonus_budget_parameters bbp on bb.bonus_budget_id =bbp.bonus_budget_id and bbp.delete_flag =0 left join target_setting ts on ts.target_year = bb.budget_year and ts.indicator_id = bbp.indicator_id and ts.delete_flag =0 left join target_outcome to2 on to2.target_year = bb.budget_year and to2.delete_flag =0 left join target_outcome_details toc on to2.target_outcome_id = toc.target_outcome_id and toc.indicator_id = bbp.indicator_id and toc.delete_flag =0 where bb.budget_year =#{annualBonusYear} and bb.delete_flag=0

SELECT bonus_budget_id, budget_year, amount_bonus_budget, bonus_before_one, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM bonus_budget WHERE budget_year = #{planYear} and delete_flag=0
